snippet.title: Paperville Panic OFFICIAL Release Trailer
snippet.description:
You’re a rookie firefighter in a town made out of paper... want to watch the world burn?

Smash, sploosh, sizzle & scream your way through a brand new VR experience on Vive, Oculus or Windows MR when Paperville Panic launches this Sep 20 on SteamVR 🚨🚀🚨

Store: https://goo.gl/uMph82
Facebook: https://goo.gl/qYv58m
Twitter: https://goo.gl/K7sqFz
Website: https://goo.gl/zKgcNQ

Paperville Panic is an action-filled, narrative driven virtual reality adventure from indie studio Ultimerse. When fire breaks out in a town made entirely of paper, it's up to you to save it.

Paperville is proof that anyone has what it takes to be a hero, as long as safety and saving lives aren’t priorities. Guided by a less-than-stellar fire department, Rookie (that’s you!)  must help restore Paperville to it’s former papery glory. From clearing building fires, rescuing citizens from rubble, hacking through doors, to dealing with townsfolk and their personal issues, Rookie does it all. 

Only you can be the one to save Paperville. Well, someone else probably could, but you’re all they’ve got.

Find out more at www.papervillepanic.com! 🔥💧🔫
